document_data.name: Turcassan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Turcassan''' was a former noble house of [[Cormyr]]. It was situated beyond the [[Royal Gardens]] in [[Suzail]].

The house betrayed the Crown when [[Melineth Turcassan]], in the king's absence, sold the city of Suzail to [[pirate]]s, although [[Jotor Turcassan]] remained loyal to the crown.
document_data.Members:
* [[Melineth Turcassan]], father-in-law to King [[Duar Obarskyr]]
* [[Daverna Turcassan]], daughter of Melineth and Queen to King Duar
* [[Jotor Turcassan]]
* [[Relve Turcassan]], most capable human battle leader in Cormyr at the founding of the realm<ref>{{Cite dragon/278/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Treasures of Cormyr|89}}
